branchCategory.name: AFF

branchItem.name: AFF70~90D, Main Line Filter
branchItem.description: <p>The new AFF70~90D improves upon the performance of the classic AFF with a 1 &mu;m particulate rating and increased water removal capabilities.  Additionally, flow capacities are improved over the current models.  Installation space is saved by integrating the traditional AFF filtering function with the water removal of the AMG.  A lightweight stainless bowl assembly saves improves handling and simplifies service.</p>

branchItem.name: AFF2C-22C/AFF37B-75B, Main Line Filter
branchItem.description: <p>The classic AFF series is an excellent first stage in an air purification scheme.  This coarse (3 &mu;m) filter removes foreign matter and droplets to protect down stream dryers and extend the life of more precise filters.  Units are easily serviced, and diry elements can be disposed of  while handling only the filter bowl.</span></p>
